type.name: ElementToXML
type.description: Used to transform element struct to XML string.

element.name: extendedAddress
element.description: If present, an extended formatted address (max of 5 lines) for POI detail screen shall be provided.

element.name: compactAddress
element.description: If present, a compact formatted address (max of 2 lines) for list view shall be provided.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of address specified (used to decide which fields have priority when geocoding). Can be: ‘street’,’intersect’, ‘airport’, 'freeform'.

attribute.name: streetAddress
attribute.description: Street Address

attribute.name: crossStreet
attribute.description: Cross Street (used when a address in specified in terms of an intersection)

attribute.name: street
attribute.description: Street Name

attribute.name: city
attribute.description: City Name

attribute.name: county
attribute.description: County Name

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: State (Standard two letter abbreviation)

attribute.name: postal
attribute.description: Postal Code (Zip Code in US)

attribute.name: country
attribute.description: 3-digit ISO code

attribute.name: countryName
attribute.description: Country Name

attribute.name: airport
attribute.description: Airport Code

attribute.name: freeform
attribute.description: Freeform street address. Only required when type is 'freeform'.

element.name: searchQueryEvent
element.description: Local search event.

element.name: searchDetailEvent
element.description: Display search detail event.

element.name: impressionEvent
element.description: Display impression event.

element.name: mapEvent
element.description: Display map event.

element.name: placeMessageEvent
element.description: Place message event.

element.name: facebookUpdateEvent
element.description: Update facebook event.

element.name: callEvent
element.description: Phone call event.

element.name: addFavoritesEvent
element.description: Add to favorites event.

element.name: routeRequestEvent
element.description: Route request event.

element.name: routeReplyEvent
element.description: Route reply event.

element.name: routeStateEvent
element.description: Route state change event.

element.name: gpsProbesEvent
element.description: GPS probe event.

element.name: feedbackEvent
element.description: Feedback from user. Report a concern feature.

element.name: appErrorEvent
element.description: Application error event. Only errors reported to the user.

element.name: wifiProbesEvent
element.description: Wi-Fi probe event.

element.name: weburlEvent
element.description: Viewed the URL associated with an ad.

element.name: arrivalEvent
element.description: Successfully arrived at the destination specified by an advertisement.

element.name: transactionEvent
element.description: Generic server reply event.

element.name: eventMetadata
element.description: Event metadata.

element.name: announcementEvent
element.description: Event for announcement made during a nav session.

element.name: userActionEvent
element.description: Generic event to capture a command from the user to the application.

element.name: sessionStartEvent
element.description: Session start event with location info.

element.name: invocationContext
element.description: Provides the user context in which this event was generated.

element.name: settingsChangeEvent
element.description: setting change event.

element.name: shareEvent
element.description: setting change event.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier associated with this place.

attribute.name: ts
attribute.description: The timestamp for the event represented as GPS time.

attribute.name: sessionId
attribute.description: Unique session identifier for this client. A timestamp is a good choice here.

attribute.name: actionSession
attribute.description: A unique session identifier for this client representing an active session with the server. This value should be set in the client when the application is started and should be reset if the client is inactive for a period of time.

element.name: position
element.description: Position (type=”gps”) at which the session started.

element.name: trafficAnanouncementInfo
element.description: Provides traffic information used for the announcement.

attribute.name: navSessionId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for this navigation session.

attribute.name: routeRequestEventId
attribute.description: Event ID associated with the original route request.

attribute.name: routeReplyEventId
attribute.description: Event ID associated with the original route reply.

attribute.name: announcement
attribute.description: Announcement made to the user.

attribute.name: duration
attribute.description: Travel time along route remaining (in seconds).

attribute.name: distance
attribute.description: Routing distance in meters away from destination.

element.name: pair
element.description: Key values for all the pronuns used in the announcement.

attribute.name: routeState
attribute.description: only for route state event

element.name: position
element.description: Position (type=”gps”) at which the session started.

element.name: searchFilter
element.description: The filter criteria for the proximity search.

element.name: point
element.description: Center of the proximity search.

element.name: searchEventCookie
element.description: Contains information to be sent back to the server when reporting a search event.

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: POI data scheme to use.

attribute.name: inputMethod
attribute.description: The user input method of the search.(optional)

attribute.name: asrProviderSessionId
attribute.description: Attribute is present, when the search string was obtained from ASR service.(optional)

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: The place whose detail is displayed.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: The place associated with the impression.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: The place being mapped.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: Place sent/received.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: Place sent/received.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: The place called. If not a place and just a number the number should not be recorded.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: Describes the place being added to favorites.

element.name: position
element.description: Position (type=”gps”) at which the state change occured.

attribute.name: navSessionId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for this navigation session.

attribute.name: routeRequestEventId
attribute.description: Event ID associated with the original route request.

attribute.name: routeReplyEventId
attribute.description: Event ID associated with the original route reply.

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: One of: “recalc”, “app-suspend”, “app-resume”, “new-route”, “pause-route”, “resume-route”, “app-exit”, “stop”.

attribute.name: duration
attribute.description: Travel time along route remaining (in seconds).

attribute.name: distance
attribute.description: Routing distance in meters away from destination.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Specifies a type of enhanced data displayed during a navigation session.Valid key values include: “junction”, “realistic signs”, and “city models”.

attribute.name: country
attribute.description: Country code – ISO 3166-1 alpha 3.

element.name: gps
element.description: First probe in this bundle.

element.name: gpsOffset
element.description: If present, these are additional probes with the data provided as offsets.

attribute.name: packingVersion
attribute.description: Version of the protocol used for packing the GPS probes.

attribute.name: sessionId
attribute.description: Identifies this navigation or follow-me session. A timestamp may be a good choice here.

attribute.name: screenId
attribute.description: This is unique identifier agreed upon by the server and client for each screen, and is used to identify from which screen a concern was reported.

attribute.name: navSessionId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for any navigational session.

attribute.name: routeRequestEventId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for any route from a client in the session.

attribute.name: searchQueryEventId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for any POI search from a client in the session.

attribute.name: providerId
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the feed provider.

attribute.name: poiId
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the feed source.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Concern which the user report.

attribute.name: errorCode
attribute.description: Client-side error code.

attribute.name: detailedCode
attribute.description: Technical summary of the problem.

attribute.name: detailedDescription
attribute.description: Details that will help debugging the error. This may include a stack trace, if appropriate.

element.name: gps
element.description: Fix associated with the visible Wi-Fi networks.

element.name: wifiProbe
element.description: The visible Wi-Fi networks that were discovered at the time the GPS fix was received.

element.name: wifiCapabilities
element.description: This element describes the capabilities of the network.

attribute.name: macAddress
attribute.description: A MAC-48 identifier, which consists of a string listing the individual bytes as hexadecimal numbers as in “00:1d:7e:e5:d6:7f”.

element.name: generalSetting
element.description: general settings.

element.name: navigationSetting
element.description: navigation settings.

element.name: routeSetting
element.description: route settings.

element.name: mapsettings
element.description: map settings.

element.name: addressLine
element.description: A formatted address line.

element.name: addressLine
element.description: If present, must insert between to line 1 and line2 when address is shown in one line. If not present for one line address, client shall put a space between line1 and line2.

element.name: lineSeparator
element.description: A formatted address line.

attribute.name: separator
attribute.description: A character (ex ‘,’) used to separate line 1 and 2.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Address line.

attribute.name: lat
attribute.description: latitude of the point

attribute.name: lon
attribute.description: longitude of the point

type.name: Gps
type.description: This element specifies a GPS fix in unpacked form.

element.name: point
element.description: Location for the gps fix

attribute.name: time
attribute.description: the UTC time for this fix

attribute.name: heading
attribute.description: heading for the fix in degrees.

attribute.name: speed
attribute.description: speed for the fix in meters/sec.

attribute.name: altitude
attribute.description: altitude for the fix in meters

attribute.name: umag
attribute.description: magnitude of the standard deviation of the position uncertainty

attribute.name: uang
attribute.description: angle of the position uncertainty

attribute.name: ua
attribute.description: standard deviation of the uncertainty in the direction of uang.

attribute.name: up
attribute.description: standard deviation of the uncertainty in direction perpendicular to uang.

type.name: Position
type.description: This element specifies a where something is on the Earth. There are three variant types.

attribute.name: variant
attribute.description: Must be ‘point’

element.name: point
element.description: Specifies a latitude and longitude

attribute.name: accuracy
attribute.description: Geographic location accuracy

attribute.name: time
attribute.description: Geographic location time

type.name: Box
type.description: This element specifies a bounding box

element.name: rightCornerPoint
element.description: Define the min/max latitude and longitude which bounds the entity described

element.name: leftCornerPoint
element.description: Define the min/max latitude and longitude which bounds the entity described

element.name: address
element.description: Address for the location

element.name: point
element.description: Point (Latitude/Longitude) for this location

element.name: box
element.description: Bounding box for the location

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the location

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the font.

attribute.name: data
attribute.description: The actual text.

type.name: Color
type.description: This element specifies the color. RGB value

attribute.name: red
attribute.description: The color code of RED.

attribute.name: green
attribute.description: The color code of GREEN.

attribute.name: blue
attribute.description: The color code of BLUE.

type.name: Newline
type.description: Newlines needed (if any) in the formatted text.

type.name: FormattedText
type.description: This element specifies a formatted block of text.

element.name: text
element.description: The contents of the formatted text.

element.name: color
element.description: The colors (if any) of the formatted text.

element.name: font
element.description: The fonts (if any) of the formatted text.

element.name: newline
element.description: Newlines needed (if any) in the formatted text.

element.name: link
element.description: Link for display text.

type.name: Url
type.description: This element specifies a web address (URL)

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The URL

type.name: Origin
type.description: This element specifies the origin for a trip

element.name: gps
element.description: GPS point history, recent first representing the current location of the device. If no gps elements are present, then a point must be present.

element.name: point
element.description: Origin for the route. Ignored if gps is present.

attribute.name: streetAddress
attribute.description: Street address for the origin (optional), str must be present if this is present

attribute.name: streetName
attribute.description: Street name for the origin (optional)

type.name: Destination
type.description: This element specifies the destination for a trip

element.name: gps
element.description: GPS point history, recent first representing the current location of the device. If no gps elements are present, then a point must be present.

element.name: point
element.description: Destination for the route. Ignored if gps is present.

attribute.name: streetAddress
attribute.description: Street address for the origin (optional), str must be present if this is present

attribute.name: streetName
attribute.description: Street name for the destination (optional)

element.name: fixedDate
element.description: Date of the event.

element.name: category
element.description: Category associated with the event.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the event, can be: movie, event

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: 'opening-day': Represents opening day of a movie

attribute.name: day
attribute.description: Day of the month (1 to 31).

attribute.name: month
attribute.description: Month (1 to 12).

attribute.name: year
attribute.description: Year represented in 4 digit (eg 2014).

attribute.name: temperature
attribute.description: Current temperature at this station in degrees C.

attribute.name: weatherCondition
attribute.description: The reported weather conditions expanded to a string.

attribute.name: conditionCode
attribute.description: The reported weather conditions as a numeric code.

attribute.name: maxTempInLast24hr
attribute.description: Reported 24 hour maximum temperature in degrees C.

attribute.name: minTempInLast24hr
attribute.description: Reported 24 hour minimum temperature in degrees C.

attribute.name: utcOffset
attribute.description: UTC offset in seconds.

element.name: weatherConditionsSummary
element.description: Specifies summary of weather conditions at a place.

attribute.name: key
attribute.description: Describes which of the available details to return to the client for each match. Can be: 'suggest', 'single-search', 'geocode', 'carousel-poi-search', 'airport', 'movie-list', 'movie-theater', 'related-search', 'list-interest-suggest', 'interest', 'add-interest-suggest'.

element.name: hoursOfOperation
element.description: Specifies the business’ hours of operation, returned as structured fields.

element.name: vendorContent
element.description: Contents that needs to be attributes for vendor.

element.name: pair
element.description: Pairs that require attribution for the vendor Attributed pairs for TripAdvisor: vendor-url.

element.name: overAllRating
element.description: Represents an overall user rating of the quality of the POI.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Vendor name (Ex: TripAdvisor).

attribute.name: dayOfWeek
attribute.description: Day of the week, where Sunday = 0.

attribute.name: startTime
attribute.description: Time of day in which a business opens, specified as number of seconds since midnight (local time of business).

attribute.name: endTime
attribute.description: Time of day in which a business closes, specified as number of seconds since midnight (local time of business).

element.name: timeRange
element.description: Hours of operation for each day of the week in which a business is open.

attribute.name: utcOffset
attribute.description: String representation of int32 for UTC offset in seconds for the POI local time.

attribute.name: line1
attribute.description: String to be displayed for the related search.

element.name: noMapData
element.description: Empty element present if the country does not have map data available

element.name: partialVisualMapData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has partial coverage for visual map data

element.name: fullVisualMapData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has full coverage for visual map data

element.name: partialRoutingData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has partial coverage for routing data

element.name: fullRoutingData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has full coverage for routing data

element.name: partialGeocodingData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has partial coverage for geocoding data

element.name: fullGeocodingData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has full coverage for geocoding data

element.name: partialPoiData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has partial coverage for POI data

element.name: fullPoiData
element.description: Empty element present if the country has full coverage for POI data

element.name: event
element.description: Event under proxmatch.

element.name: searchFilter
element.description: The filter criteria for the search.

element.name: pair
element.description: Additional pairs for POI details.

element.name: category
element.description: Category associated with the POI.

element.name: category
element.description: Note: Not used for search. Mandatory for proxpoi.

element.name: searchFilter
element.description: Note: Not used for search. Mandatory for proxpoi.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the summary. Used only when all results belong to same type. This helps the client to use specific UI based on type. Can be : movie, event, movie-theater.

element.name: gpsBased
element.description: Boolean used to indicate GPS based place. Used for search centers, map, and routes.The element is empty

element.name: goldenCookie
element.description: Present if the event performed on the place is billable. Contains information required to bill the event.

element.name: placeEventCookie
element.description: Contains information to be sent back to the server when reporting an event on a place. Populated with the place-event-cookie returned in the associated place’s poi-content element (if one was returned).

element.name: premiumPlacement
element.description: If present, indicates that this is a Premium Placement Ad. The element is empty.

element.name: EnhancedPoi
element.description: If present, indicates that this is an Enhanced POI.The element is empty

element.name: poiAttributeCookie
element.description: Contains information to be sent back to server when reporting an event on a particular attribute. Populated with the poi-attribute-cookie returned in the associated attribute.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier associated with this place. Is used to identify a place returned from a Local Search. If available (i.e. not an empty string), the id should be set with the POI id in the poi-content element, otherwise the index into the local search result list is sufficient. (Optional, but must be present if there is a search-query-event-id).

attribute.name: searchQueryEventId
attribute.description: If the event action is performed on a place returned from a Local Search, this is the event id associated with that search. (Optional)

attribute.name: index
attribute.description: Zero-based index of the place (i.e. POI or Ad) in the search results list. Optional, but starting with V6, must be present if there is a search-query-event-id.

attribute.name: origin
attribute.description: Origin of the action performed on this place.Possible values are ‘list’ (triggered from the list view) ‘map’ (triggered from the map view) ‘detail’ (triggered from the detail view) Optional, but starting with V6, must be present if there is a search-query-event-id.

attribute.name: providerId
attribute.description: Data provider of the attribute.

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: List of params needed for reporting.

attribute.name: navSessionId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for this navigation session.

attribute.name: routeRequestEventId
attribute.description: Route request event ID.

attribute.name: routeDuration
attribute.description: Travel time for route in seconds.

attribute.name: routeDistance
attribute.description: Distance for route in meters.

element.name: analyticsEventPlace
element.description: The place associated with the event

attribute.name: channel
attribute.description: Chanel used for sharing.

attribute.name: body
attribute.description: share body.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: share url.

attribute.name: urlText
attribute.description: url text.

element.name: analyticsEventOrigin
element.description: Origin for the route.

element.name: analyticsEventDestination
element.description: Destination for the route.

attribute.name: navSessionId
attribute.description: Unique identifier for this navigation session. A timestamp is a good choice here.

attribute.name: reason
attribute.description: One of init, restart, reload, off-route, wrong-way, user, detour, preview.

attribute.name: sourceModule
attribute.description: Module in which the event was triggered (Map, Search and Navigation etc.)

attribute.name: screenId
attribute.description: Screen in which the query was triggered.

attribute.name: inputSource
attribute.description: Data source used for query parameters.

attribute.name: invocationMethod
attribute.description: Specifies how the request was initiated.

attribute.name: transactionId
attribute.description: ID generated by the server for identifying the specific query/reply event.

attribute.name: requestTime
attribute.description: Milliseconds.Time at which server received the request.

attribute.name: waitTime
attribute.description: Milliseconds.Time taken by the server to process the request and generate reply.

attribute.name: mdn
attribute.description: Optional. The MDN associated with the device.

attribute.name: clientGuid
attribute.description: If the want-guid-assigned element is present, this value is ignored and a new GUID will be assigned.

attribute.name: deviceUniqueId
attribute.description: Optional This is the hardware unique identifier of the device.

attribute.name: deviceSerialNumber
attribute.description: Optional except for Android platform.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: Platform version as provided by the platform API.

attribute.name: manufacturer
attribute.description: Device manufacturer information.

attribute.name: model
attribute.description: Device model name.

attribute.name: credential
attribute.description: The authentication token.

attribute.name: language
attribute.description: This attribute represents the default language setting of the device, not the current language setting of the application. The application language setting must be specified within the individual TPS queries that require it.

attribute.name: countryCode
attribute.description: Optional. 3 character string specifying the country code for the request.

attribute.name: carrier
attribute.description: Name of the carrier.

attribute.name: mcc
attribute.description: Mobile Country Code.

attribute.name: mnc
attribute.description: Mobile Network Code.

attribute.name: clientSession
attribute.description: A unique session identifier for this client representing an application session with the server.

attribute.name: pushMessageGuid
attribute.description: Client GUID used for push notification.

element.name: userInfo
element.description: Provides user information.

element.name: deviceInfo
element.description: Provides device information of the client.

element.name: platformInfo
element.description: Provides platform information of the client.

element.name: productInfo
element.description: Provides product information of the client.

element.name: localeInfo
element.description: Provides locale information of the client.

element.name: carrierInfo
element.description: Provides information about the carrier of the client.

element.name: sessionInfo
element.description: Provides the session information of the client.

element.name: pushMessageInfo
element.description: Provides the push message information of the client.

element.name: formattedIdenParameters
element.description: Information identifying the client.

element.name: invocationContext
element.description: Context in which the specific query was triggered.

element.name: transactionInfo
element.description: Provides the transaction related information.

element.name: wantExtendedAddress
element.description: If present, full formatted address (max 5 lines) shall be returned.

element.name: wantCompactAddress
element.description: If present, compact formatted address (max2 lines) shall be returned.

attribute.name: scale
attribute.description: Map scale to consider when determining the level of detail to use while geocoding. Prevents excessive detail.

element.name: location
element.description: Location of the closest point on the feature, may not be exactly the same as the position in the Reverse Geocode Request.

element.name: wantedContent
element.description: Request specific type of data (junction models, realistic road signs, city models, map tiles, etc.)There should be one of these elements per country where data is needed.This element should not be included for a map tiles only query.

element.name: wantExtendedMaps
element.description: If present, the client can handle extended map tile configurations in the reply

element.name: wantNoTransparency
element.description: If present, server shall provide URL templates that only serve up non transparent tiles for traffic overlay and SARs.

element.name: wantUnifiedMaps
element.description: If Present, the client can handle the unified map tile configuration in the reply

element.name: wantLoc
element.description: If present, the server shall provide URL templates that contain a $loc localization parameter (for those layers where the localization parameter is applicable). If not present, the $loc parameter will not be included in the URL template.

attribute.name: language
attribute.description: The current language setting of the device. If the specified language is not supported by the tile server, then en-US (American English) will be returned in the configuration.

attribute.name: screenWidth
attribute.description: The screen width of the device, specified in pixels. Note:This element is required if want-extended-maps is present, otherwise optional.

attribute.name: screenHeight
attribute.description: The screen height of the device, specified in pixels. Note:This element is required if want-extended-maps is present, otherwise optional.

attribute.name: screenResolution
attribute.description: The resolution of the screen, specified in DPI (dots per inch). Note: This element is required if want-extended-maps is present, otherwise optional.

attribute.name: country
attribute.description: Country code – ISO 3166-1 alpha 3

attribute.name: DatasetId
attribute.description: If empty, all datasets of the given type are returned

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: One of: “textures”, “city models”, “realistic signs”, or “junctions”. If empty, all types with the given dataset are returned.

element.name: internalSource
element.description: If present the map source is owned by TCS

element.name: url
element.description: Base URL for all url-args-template elements

element.name: urlArgsTemplate
element.description: Parameter Description $v The version (generation) of tiles $id The id of a specific tile, junction, or sign $fmt Format can be any one of the following ‘PNG’, ‘GIF’, ‘JPG’, or ‘BIN’ $x x coordinate of the requested map tile $y y coordinate of the requested map tile $z zoom level $q quadkey. If this parameter is present, then it replaces x/y/z $rid1 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. This is the base64 enocoded representation of the ‘route id’. $rc1 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. Color is specified either as RGB(r,g,b) or RGB(r,b,g,a) $rid2 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. This is the base64 enocoded representation of the ‘route id’. $rc2 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. Color is specified either as RGB(r,g,b) or RGB(r,b,g,a) $ds The dataset id $mv The manifest version $fmtv The format version. This is usually the version of the internal binary format that is currently supported by the client.

attribute.name: gen
attribute.description: Generation of the map tiles. This attribute is deprecated. It should not be returned if want-extended-maps is present in the query.

attribute.name: projection
attribute.description: Map projection type

attribute.name: country
attribute.description: Country code – ISO 3166-1 alpha 3

element.name: internalSource
element.description: If present the map source is owned by TCS

element.name: url
element.description: Base URL for all url-args-template elements

element.name: urlArgsTemplate
element.description: Parameter Description $v The version (generation) of tiles $id The id of a specific tile, junction, or sign $fmt Format can be any one of the following ‘PNG’, ‘GIF’, ‘JPG’, or ‘BIN’ $x x coordinate of the requested map tile $y y coordinate of the requested map tile $z zoom level $q quadkey. If this parameter is present, then it replaces x/y/z $rid1 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. This is the base64 enocoded representation of the ‘route id’. $rc1 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. Color is specified either as RGB(r,g,b) or RGB(r,b,g,a) $rid2 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. This is the base64 enocoded representation of the ‘route id’. $rc2 This parameter is only valid for ‘route’ overlay tiles. Color is specified either as RGB(r,g,b) or RGB(r,b,g,a) $ds The dataset id $mv The manifest version $fmtv The format version. This is usually the version of the internal binary format that is currently supported by the client.

attribute.name: gen
attribute.description: Generation of the map tiles. This attribute is deprecated. It should not be returned if want-extended-maps is present in the query.

attribute.name: projection
attribute.description: Map projection type

attribute.name: country
attribute.description: Country code – ISO 3166-1 alpha 3

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the data to be downloaded “junctions”, “realistic signs”, “city models”, “textures”, and “map tiles”

attribute.name: featureSetVersion
attribute.description: The version of the set of unified map features understood and handled by this client

element.name: box
element.description: Boundaries for which all contained results should be returned.

element.name: address
element.description: only for address search.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Identifies the type of results to be enabled. Can be: ‘poi’,’address’, ‘movie’, 'event'., 'fuel-price'

element.name: proxMatchContent
element.description: Results which represent event content available in the local area.

element.name: resultDescription
element.description: Result description provided for client to display.

element.name: proxMatchSummary
element.description: Summary element to indicate that all matches belong to the same category (movie or event). This helps the client to display esults list UI based on the category.

element.name: suggestList
element.description: List of suggest matches grouped together.

element.name: suggestMatch
element.description: Results which represent suggestions.

element.name: wantCompactAddress
element.description: If present, compact formatted address (max2 lines) shall be returned.

element.name: syncAddItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was added to the database on the server since the last synchronization.

element.name: syncAssignItemId
element.description: Specifies the id assigned to a client added item by the server.

element.name: syncModifyItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was changed in the database on the server since the last synchronization.

element.name: syncDeleteItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was deleted in the database on the server since the last synchronization.

element.name: syncError
element.description: If present, an error occurred while synchronizing the database.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the database. Currently one of “recents”, or “favorites”.

attribute.name: newSyncGeneration
attribute.description: Identifies the generation of the database that was synchronized to the mobile.

attribute.name: dbID
attribute.description: Specifies the id of the user-place-db associated with the specified name.

attribute.name: count
attribute.description: Indicates the total number of places within the specified database after the sync operation.

element.name: syncAddItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was added to the database on the mobile device since the last synchronization.

element.name: syncDeleteItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was deleted from the database on the mobile device since the last synchronization.

element.name: syncModifyItem
element.description: Specifies an item that was changed in the database on the mobile device since the last synchronization.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the database. Currently one of “recents”, or “favorites”.

attribute.name: lastSyncGeneration
attribute.description: Identifies the generation of the database that was last synchronized to the mobile.

attribute.name: dbID
attribute.description: The id of the user-place-db corresponding to the name as last returned in a sync-places-db-reply, or 0 (zero) if no sync has occurred.

element.name: place
element.description: Specifies the details of the place.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The local id previously assigned to this place. Signed integer encoded as a string.

attribute.name: modtime
attribute.description: The modification time for this place (in seconds since the UNIX epoch).

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the place being deleted.

element.name: place
element.description: Specifies the details of the place.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the place being deleted.

attribute.name: modtime
attribute.description: The new modification time for this place.

attribute.name: localId
attribute.description: The local id previously assigned to this place. Signed integer encoded as a string.

attribute.name: serverId
attribute.description: The server id assigned to this place. Signed integer encoded as a string. If this id is less than 0, then the place was deleted during the reconciliation of the sync (i.e. it was pushed off the bottom of the LRU list).

attribute.name: code
attribute.description: Specifies the error that occurred: “F”=The specified database is full, “I”=The specified data is inconsistent with the database.

attribute.name: number
attribute.description: When the database is full, specifies the number of excess places. (Must be zero if code is other than “F”).

element.name: syncPlacesDBStatusQuery
element.description: Deternines if synchronization is necessary for a specific places database.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the database. Currently one of “recents”, or “favorites”.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the database. Currently one of “recents”, or “favorites”.

attribute.name: generation
attribute.description: Identifies the current generation of the database on the server.

element.name: emulator
element.description: If present, the device is an emulator.

element.name: wantIdenReceipt
element.description: If present, the server will return an Iden Receipt document.

element.name: wantClientGuidAssigned
element.description: If present, the server will assign a GUID and return it in the Iden Receipt. Clients should send the new GUID in the guid attribute. If want-iden-receipt is not present, want-guid-assigned will be ignored.

element.name: formattedIdenParameters
element.description: If present, all the attributes SHALL be sent in individual child elements.
